title: Browns Shoes Scraper
description: Extract product listings from Browns Shoes. Specify category, filters, or provide custom URLs. Uses JSON API for speed, falls back to HTML parsing when needed.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of Browns Shoes URLs to scrape. If provided, category and filters are ignored.

minPrice.title: Minimum Price
minPrice.description: Filter products with price greater than or equal to this value (CAD).

maxPrice.title: Maximum Price
maxPrice.description: Filter products with price less than or equal to this value (CAD).

maxItems.title: Maximum Products
maxItems.description: Maximum number of products to scrape.

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of listing pages to process.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for anti-blocking protection. Residential proxies recommended.
